notification.contentToBeAnonymized: O le a fa'ailoaina lau mea i totonu o aso e 7 mo
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: O mea uma lava i totonu o lenei nu'u o le a fa'ailoaina ma teu i totonu o aso e 7, pe a mae'a lena e te le mafai ona tape pe suia. Va'ai i au mea i lalo.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: O mea uma lava i totonu o lenei kulupu o le a fa'ailoaina ma teu i totonu o aso e 7, pe a mae'a lena e te le mafai ona tape pe suia. Va'ai i au mea i lalo.

post.statusChangeSubject: Uiga o le pou ua suia

email.possibleFraudFooter: Kiliki i le so'otaga a le nu'u i lalo, ulufale pei o le pule ma filifili le Pulega o Faiga Pi'opi'o mai le lisi.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Numera o gaioiga fa'atamala ma le avanoa e 75% o le a fa'atamala
email.possibleFraudInformation: Ua iloa e la matou faiga otometi ni gaioiga fa'atamala. E mafai ona e silasila toto'a e ala i le vaega pule a le nu'u. O nisi o nei gaioiga e ono iai mafua'aga le fa'atamala o lea ia fa'atatau lelei ae le'i tapeina mea.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Ua otometi ona fa'ailoa lenei mea ona o le oona e ala i algorithms AI o lo'o fuafua le oona o le mea. E mafai ona e tape le mea pe a mana'omia.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Ua otometi ona fa'ailoa e se algorithm AI ata vaaia e feso'ota'i ma lenei mea. O lenei algorithm e iloilo ata mo ni ata mataga, sauƒÅ, fa'afoma'i, ma ata fa'ase'e. E mafai ona e tape le mea pe a mana'omia.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: I nisi taimi e fa'atatau ai e le AI algorithm se togi sese, i lena tulaga aua le popole, e leai se isi gaioiga e tatau ona e faia ma e mafai ona e le amana'ia lenei imeli.
email.automaticToxicityHowLikely: Fa'afefea ona mafai (%) i le avea ma o'ona
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Fa'aPeretania tusitusiga na fa'aoga mo le togi
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Ua fa'aopoopo se manatu fou i lenei manatu
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Ua fa'aopoopo se manatu fou i lau manatu
email.hasBeenMarkedDown: ua fa'ailogaina o le a le aoga
email.writtenByUser: Tusia e se tagata fa'aoga ua ta'ua o
email.hasBeenReported: ua lipotia mo le solia o tulafono
email.youCanViewItHere: E mafai ona e va'ai i ai iinei
email.postReport: Ua lipotia le manatu ona o le solia o tulafono
email.pointReport: Ua lipotia le manatu ona o le solia o tulafono
email.user_invite_1: Ua e valaauliaina e auai i...
email.user_invite_2: Kiliki i le sootaga pe kopi i totonu o se pusa tuatusi su'esu'e e taliaina le valaaulia
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: Manatu ua faailogaina le aoga mo la'u manatu
email.pointHelpfulSelf: Manatu ua faailogaina le aoga mo la'u manatu
email.reset_password_1: O le sootaga lea e sui ai lau upu.
email.reset_password_2: Afai e te le'i talosagaina lenei, fa'amolemole le amana'ia lenei imeli.
email.reset_password_3: E le suia lau upu tatala se'i vagana ua e ulufale i le so'otaga i luga ma fausia se fou.
